title: #261: You're A Man Now (with my nephew on his Bar Mitzvah)
itunes:title: You're A Man Now with my nephew on his Bar Mitzvah
description: My nephew had his bar mitzvah last weekend. I hadn't been to one in too long. They're so much fun! It made me remember my own bar mitzvah. How important it was to me, how fun it was. They're great, you guys. Just dumb and great.
